column2: CounterPath Corp. engages in the provision of desktop and mobile VoIP software products and solutions. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia and currently employs 88 full-time employees. The firm's solutions range from software products to cloud-based services. Its software products include applications for smartphones, tablets and desktop computers, a Software Development Kit (SDK) for software developers seeking to add voice, video and messaging capabilities to their existing applications, and server-based software solutions for configuring, managing and supporting softphones and for deploying messaging and collaboration services. These software products are also available to customers in the form of cloud-based hosted services. The firm is focused on selling its software products to enterprises, telecommunication service providers and channel partners.
Suite 300, One Bentall Centre, 505 Burrard Street
